title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Design Thinking-Based Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the Design Thinking phases (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test) by analyzing real workplace cases.
Learners can propose creative solutions using verbal/non-verbal communication strategies through collaboration with team members.
Learners can create prototype improvement plans based on feedback collected via mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
